text: ITT Corporation is a global manufacturing company in the United States, in aerospace, transportation, energy and industrial markets. They are in global markets including water and fluids management. ITT originally stood for International Telephone and Telegraph; it was founded in 1920. It was originally combined from other telephone companies. Today's ITT Corporation was founded in 2006. They work in three areas: * Fluid Technology * Defense Electronics & Services * Motion & Flow Control Category:American technology companies Category:Companies based in New York (state) Category:2006 establishments in New York (state) Category:Manufacturing companies of the United States
title: ITT Inc.
